knimeNode.name: Merge
knimeNode.shortDescription: Resorts the rows. It is mostly like an "anti-sort".

fullDescription.intro:
This node is a bit like an anti-sort. If you have a list something like this:
Col1 |Col2 A |1 A |2 A |3 B |4 B |5 B |6, and you want to merge the Col1 with itself, the result will look like this:
Col1 |Col2 A |1 B |4 A |2 B |5 A |3 B |6. This might be useful for the Pivot node.
fullDescription.option: The columns not used in the reordering.
Faster in-memory operation, only this is supported.

option.name: Reverse the order in a block

fullDescription.option: Reverses the order of the rows in the generated blocks.
If the reordering is not possible consistent (because there are missing rows from a pattern) it will stop, else just writes an error to the Console.
